text:
Haha! Hello! Hihi! Look, Steve is sleeping.
Shh. Be quiet! Hey, let´s watch Steve´s

dreams. What´s he doing?
Jump! Jump! Jumping! Yeah! Jumping! Sorry.

Jump, yeah! Jump! Jump!
Jump. Jump, yeah.

Jump.
Be careful, he 
is waking up. Shh. Be quiet. Shhh.

Fly yeah! I can fly. Fly, fly, fly. Up, up,
up. Yeah! Fly. Oh. Oh no! Oh dear! But I can

still fly. Fly. I can´t run.
Shhh. Go to sleep, Steve. Go to sleep.

Swim, hehe. Swim.
What´s he doing now?

Swim, Swim…
Swim. Swimming. I can swim! Swim, swim, swim,

swim, swim, swim, swim. Yeah! Oh, there is
a shark! Swim, swim, swim, swim, swim, swim,

Swim! Swim!
Hey, it´s time to say Bye-bye.
